page.title: 05The School Day
page.content: When we get to Swanbourne First School we play in the playground until 9 o'clock when the bell rings.We line up by class and a teacher sends us in. We fetch our hymn-books and go to the Infants' classroom for Assembly.Then we go to our classroom and work till 10.30.At playtime we take our toys out- side.We play "Bulldog" or skip or talk or play "Grandmother's Footsteps".We come in at 10.45 and work till dinner-time at 12. We all have dinner in the Infants' classroom. 17 children bring sandwiches and 22 eat dinner.We are ready to play again from 12.40 to 1.15.At 2.30 we stop for another quarter hour's playtime and work till 3.30 when we go home. 15 children catch the school bus to Little Horwood and the others walk or go by car.
